issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: We noticed that a few times now. When we change the semantic.colors.json in a recurring build (latest master, 8.3.0), it seems like sometimes the new colors are not recognized / skipped for recurring build. After a clean build, it works again. This makes rapid development very hard, so please look into this.
fields.summary: iOS: Semantic colors file not properly updated on recurring builds
